Text:
function Visual_LV1()
    -- ※以下、①を選択した場合
    -- .女装稽古【ビジュアル】LV.1「ガールズファッション講座-入門編-」

    -- //黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Alright, Minachin, first try putting on this outfit."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1438.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ehh!? This is..."]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM11.wav",1000,true)

    -- //CG：お着替えエリカ
    -- 　　※衣装はオフショルダータイプのワンピース。
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV045aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ My reflection in the mirror showed me wearing a pure white dress.]])

    MSG([[ It was much more revealing than the uniform, my shoulders and chest feeling chilly. From my perspective, with my broader shoulders, it was obvious I looked like a guy.]])

    MSG([[ But Akira’s reaction was different.]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yeah, yeah. It suits you well. You look cute, like a girl who’s put effort into her first date."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1439.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "W-Where does it suit me...? My build clearly looks weird."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No, no. Minachin’s body doesn’t tend to bulk up muscles, so it’s totally fine. What you’re saying right now is going to make all girls worried about having a gorilla build your enemy, you know?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The chest pads feel comfortable too, right? I even adjusted the color a bit to match your skin tone, and if the dress slips down, it should at least fool people a little."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1440.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I really hope that kind of 'if' never happens."]])

    MSG([[ Wearing a one-piece that connects top and bottom is new to me, making my heart race. I started sweating nervously, and the skirt clinging to my legs felt uncomfortable.]])

    -- //CG：お着替えエリカ（透け）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV045ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Ah, the sweat made the silhouette of my trunks underneath start to show through! Even if I’m at home, it’s so embarrassing I could die!]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "How is it? It feels totally different from the uniforms and casual clothes you've worn so far, right?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1441.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-Yeah... I guess everyday clothes feel way more comfortable."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "The sweat’s making it really see-through... D-Don’t girls find that embarrassing...?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Nah, that’s not the case at all."]])

    MSG([[ Akira took out a thin piece of underwear from the costume case, similar to the dress.]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s common to wear underwear or innerwear under dresses like this. Right now, Minachin is a full-fledged provocateur; if you go out, all the guys' gazes will be on you."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1443.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-You should’ve said that earlier!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Oh? If I said it earlier, you’d have worn this slip?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Good to hear that. Since only Minachin fiercely defends wearing men's underwear, it makes sense to start getting used to slips and camisoles first."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The day has finally come to put to good use all the underwear Mom has been randomly buying."]])

    MSG([[ N-No good. I think I’ve dug myself a big hole... I’m not brave enough to wear girls’ underwear yet. I’ve got to change the subject and avoid being made to wear underwear!]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1444.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "E-Even so, unlike men’s clothes, you have to think about underwear too. Being a girl is tough."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1181.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin, you get it."]])

    MSG([[ Yes! She’s into it. I’ll keep diverting the topic this way.]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1445.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I don’t know much about fashion, so this is educational. Akira, have you ever studied fashion?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I like reading fashion magazines."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1183.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, it’s one of those things where you want what you can’t have. I’m short, hunched, and have this dull face, right? Watching girls wear glamorous clothes I can’t wear is actually fun."]])

    MSG([[ I almost said, "I think Akira would suit them too" but stopped. ]])

    MSG([[ I know well that her self-deprecation isn’t something she wants to be contradicted about.]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1446.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Becoming a fashion expert like Lira-san seems like it will take a lot of time..."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yeah. But at least you probably won’t want to wear one-piece or thin clothes straight on bare skin anymore, right? That’s progress."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Seeing is believing. <r=ひゃっけん>Seeing</r> is experiencing. First, you should thoroughly experience representative girls’ fashion."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1447.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Oh, I’m drifting further away from being a man’s man..."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What are you saying? A certain internet user left a great saying: ‘Cross-dressing can only be done by men, so it’s the manliest act there is.’"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So make up your mind and dedicate yourself to cross-dressing."]])

    MSG([[ Akira smiled cheerfully. I’m sure she genuinely wants to help me—this is a training she thoughtfully put together in her own way.]])

    MSG([[ Then, I have to respond with everything I’ve got!]])

    -- //CG：お着替えエリカ（透け・気合）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV045ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1448.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Alright! I’ll work hard to master girls’ fashion by the election with Lira-san!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1188.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hehe, that’s the spirit. Now next, this sexy sheer underwear..."]])

    -- //CG：お着替えエリカ（透け）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV045ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1449.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "N-No way, not yet~~~~!!!"]])

    MSG([[ The road to mastering cross-dressing is still very long...]])

    -- Visual パラメーター更新
    SaveData.TrainingParam.Visual = 1
    
    -- 1	ぼくのへんたい	『ビジュアル』レベルを１以上にした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(1)

    -- 　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    TrainingStatusUp("Visual" , 1)

    ScenarioManager.TrainingNext()
end
